title: Clown
summaries: The Clown is an uncommon Hardmode enemy that only appears during Blood Moons. The Clown's primary weapons are Happy Bombs, which deal high damage but do not destroy tiles. On [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, he can also throw Chattering Teeth Bombs. The Clown also deals contact damage with a chance of inflicting the Confused debuff.
Once the player has defeated at least one Clown in a world, the Clothier will start selling the Clown set.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer or its upgrades.
